text: Obou Narcisse Olivier Kapo (born 27 September 1980), known as Olivier Kapo, is a French former professional footballer who played as an attacking midfielder or left winger. ==Career statistics== ===Club career statistics=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Continental Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Auxerre 1998–99 Division 1 1 0 2 0 – 3 0 1999–00 15 3 2 0 – 17 3 2000–01 29 4 5 0 8 1 42 5 2001–02 25 4 2 0 – 27 4 2002–03 Ligue 1 21 6 2 0 8 1 31 7 2003–04 29 2 7 1 5 1 41 4 Total 120 19 20 1 21 3 160 23 Juventus 2004–05 Serie A 14 0 2 0 3 0 19 0 Monaco (loan) 2005–06 Ligue 1 25 5 1 0 6 2 32 7 Levante (loan) 2006–07 Primera División 30 5 2 0 – 32 5 Birmingham 2007–08 Premier League 26 5 – – 26 5 Wigan 2008–09 Premier League 19 1 2 0 – 21 1 2009–10 1 0 – – 1 0 Total 20 1 2 0 0 0 22 1 Boulogne (loan) 2009–10 Ligue 1 16 2 1 0 – 17 2 Celtic 2010–11 SPL 2 0 – – 2 0 Al Ahli 2010–11 Stars League 5 2 – – 5 2 Auxerre 2011–12 Ligue 1 15 4 – – 15 4 2012–13 Ligue 2 25 8 2 0 – 27 8 Total 40 12 2 0 0 0 42 12 Levadiakos 2013–14 Super League 19 2 – – 19 2 Korona Kielce 2014–15 Ekstraklasa 27 7 – – 27 7 Career total 344 60 30 1 30 5 404 66 ===International career statistics=== |- |2002||2||1 |- |2003||5||2 |- |2004||2||0 |- !Total||9||3 |} ==Honours== Auxerre *Coupe de France: 2002–03 France *FIFA Confederations Cup: 2003 ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:French footballers Category:Ivorian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Abidjan
